context: Unity Software Inc. is a real-time 3D development platform focused on game engine, AR/VR, and interactive content creation. Unity 5 with advanced features. No royalties.

competitors.name: Unreal Engine
competitors.notes: Became free in 2015 with 5% royalty, photorealistic graphics

competitors.name: CryEngine
competitors.notes: Crytek's engine, supports PC and console

competitors.name: Amazon Lumberyard
competitors.notes: Free engine based on CryEngine, launched 2016
